name: 12(+1) Box Preview
description:
"I heard you like games, so I put a game in a game so you can game while you game."

This is a preview of an in-progress compilation of 13 short experimental game demos made over the course of 12 months.

  • Rank the Demos! http://www.polljunkie.com/poll/zpdond/rank-the-demos
  • Choose a Favorite! http://www.polljunkie.com/poll/obeipd/which-demo
